title: What are NCT individual member fan's name? 10lovelys, Johnfam, Sunflower; do other members fans have names? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll answer for WayV. At one point, Cbars and Chinese fans on weibo voted in polls and finally chose WayV members’ individual fandom names. The fandom names are provided and explained below in order of members’ ages. Kun - NuoYi (挪移)  NuoYi (挪移) references “乾坤大挪移” (qiankun da nuoyi - a Chinese phrase which means something like “great shift”) which is also a pun on Kun’s Chinese name (钱锟 - Qian Kun). Kun made the pun a couple of times as well. Ten - 10vely  “10vely” is a reference to his name Ten(10) and “lovely” because Ten is lovely. I believe this name was created before the polls as fans used it before Ten debuted in WayV. Win Win - Yunqi (运气/昀妻)  Yunqi (运气) means luck. A homonym that is also used sometimes is 昀妻 which means Win Win's wife, because Win Win is “昀昀” in Chinese. (Note that Win Win is his stage name and his Chinese birthname is Dong Si Cheng (董思成)). Lucas - Lumi  Lumi is based on Lucas’ name which means “shining/bright/luminous”. It is also inspired by Lucas’ Nylon cover.  Hendery - Hengni  Hengni is based on his name (Huang Guanheng 黃冠亨). It’s a transliteration of “honey”, so Hendery and his fans are honey to each other. Xiaojun - Kuanggong (矿工)  Kuanggong (矿工) are miners because Xiaojun is iron and so his fans are the miners who unearthed the treasure. (I found this online but I’m not clear why Xiaojun is considered iron). Yang Yang - Yangqi (氧气)  Yangqi (氧气) means oxygen. It is a pun on Yang Yang’s name (刘扬扬). Yang Yang and his fans are oxygen for each other.

i remember having seen a post about this before but I can’t seem to find it so I’ll update if I do. other than the ones listed, i know some Jaehyun fans call themselves peaches, jisung fans are mochizens, and taeyong fans are tyongfs. most of the other members are just the name+zen, like taeilzen or yutazen. i believe that there are other specific names so I’ll keep trying to find it for your sake and my own hahaha edit : this isn’t the exact photo I was looking for but it has some names, though some are jokes
